Text: Ubuntu 6.06 is THE shit - get it now!!
Why bother with distro torrents when you can get them from the distro site.
It's shit. UBUNTU is african for "Cant Install Debian"

Yes Ubuntu looks like brown shit. Better go for Kubuntu or Xubuntu (with XFce window system)
Kubuntu even have an alternative install CD that makes it possible to install on older computers.
